Name: Cabbage
Description: Have you ever tried cabbage bowling?

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¿Alguna vez has jugado el boliche de repollo?
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 양배추로 볼링 쳐 본 적이 있나요?
DescriptionLocalization.de: Hast du mal versucht, damit zu bowlen?
DescriptionLocalization.ja: キャベツボーリングやった事ある？
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Você já tentou boliche de repolho?
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 你吃过一整碗卷心菜吗？
